name: 林筱玫
objective:
本課程旨在培養學生了解 HTML、CSS、JavaScript 組合的網頁運作原理，課程以熟悉 JavaScript 與 JQuery 基本語法為主要目的，並能靈活運用現有插件增加網頁的動態效果，評量方式則以實作演練為主。
This course aims to teach students to understand how it works page HTML, CSS, and JavaScript combination. The primary purpose, of course, is to become familiar with the programming of JavaScript and JQuery. This course will also utilize the existing plug-in adds dynamic effects page. Finally, the assessment exercise is based on an implementation approach.

3.	Introduction to HTML5, Part 2
4.	CSS3, Part 1
5.	CSS3, Part 2

7.	JavaScript: Introduction to Scripting
8.	JavaScript: Control Statements, Part 1
9.	JavaScript: Control Statements, Part 2
10.	Midterm exam
11.	JavaScript: Functions and Arrays
12.	JavaScript: Objects, JSON and JSON Parsing Tools
13.	jQuery 
14.	jQuery Mobile
15.	Basic concepts of Bootstrap
16.	Bootstrap element
17.	Bootstrap responsive web design implementation
18.	Final project demonstration
